alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Canyon Ferry Area; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued June 18 at 5:35PM MDT until June 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts up to 60 mph, are possible. * WHERE...Southwestern Montana along and south of Interstate 90, and the Canyon Ferry Area. * WHEN...From late Monday morning through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Canyon Ferry Area; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
